<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="5D0A0801C743459CB0898A9591F1B91A" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 15.95PT; FONT-FAMILY: ARIAL, SANS-SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 14PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Almaden Minerals Ltd.
</DIV>
</TD>

<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT; FONT-FAMILY: ARIAL, SANS-SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	Notes to the consolidated financial statements
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT; FONT-FAMILY: ARIAL, SANS-SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	For the years ended December 31, 2015 and 2014
</DIV>
</TD>

<TR>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM: #000000 2PX SOLID; WIDTH: 100%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">

	Presented in Canadian dollars
</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: ARIAL, SANS-SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 11PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	21.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: ARIAL, SANS-SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 11PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Management of Capital
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT; FONT-FAMILY: ARIAL, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 35.45PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The Company considers its capital to consist of components of equity. The Company's objectives when managing capital are to safeguard the Company's ability to continue as a going concern in order to pursue the exploration of its exploration and evaluation assets and to maintain a flexible capital structure which optimizes the costs of capital at an acceptable risk.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT; FONT-FAMILY: ARIAL, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 35.45PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The Company manages the capital structure and makes adjustments to it in light of changes in economic conditions and the risk characteristics of the underlying assets. To maintain or adjust the capital structure, the Company may attempt to issue new shares and, acquire or dispose of assets.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT; FONT-FAMILY: ARIAL, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 35.45PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	In order to maximize ongoing exploration efforts, the Company does not pay out dividends. The Company's investment policy is to invest its short-term excess cash in highly liquid short-term interest-bearing investments with short term maturities, selected with regards to the expected timing of expenditures from continuing operations.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT; FONT-FAMILY: ARIAL, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 35.45PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The Company expects its current capital resources will be sufficient to carry its exploration plans and operations for the foreseeable future.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: ARIAL, SANS-SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 11PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	22.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: ARIAL, SANS-SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 11PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Segmented Information
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT; FONT-FAMILY: ARIAL, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 36PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The Company operates in one reportable operating segment, being the acquisition and exploration of mineral resource properties.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT; FONT-FAMILY: ARIAL, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 36PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The Company has exploration and evaluation assets, property, plant and equipment, and deposit on mill equipment in the following geographic locations:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>
<DIV>

	Exhibit 4.5
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 9.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12.45PT; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	ARRANGEMENT AGREEMENT
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 9.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12.45PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
	THIS AGREEMENT made as of the 11th day of May, 2015.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 9.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10.85PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
	BETWEEN:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10.6PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 73PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 71PT">
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	ALMADEN MINERALS LTD.,
</FONT>
	a company incorporated under the laws of the Province of British Columbia,
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 9.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12.2PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 73PT; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	("Almaden")
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 9.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10.6PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
	AND:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10.6PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 73PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 71PT">
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	ALMADEX MINERALS LIMITED.,
</FONT>
	a company incorporated under the laws of the Province of British Columbia,
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 9.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 11.3PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 73PT; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	("Spinco")
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.3PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 8.8PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 1PT">
	WHEREAS Almaden and Spinco wish to effect a statutory plan of arrangement under section 288 of the
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
	Business Corporations Act
</FONT>
	(British Columbia) on the terms and conditions set out in this Agreement and the Plan of Arrangement annexed hereto as Exhibit A.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 9PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 1PT">
	NOW THEREFORE THIS AGREEMENT WITNESSES that, in consideration of the premises and the covenants and agreements herein contained and other good and valuable consideration, the receipt and sufficiency of which are hereby acknowledged by each of the Parties to the other, the Parties covenant and agree as follows:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 9PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 1PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10.6PT; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	ARTICLE 1
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10.6PT; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	INTERPRETATION
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 9.5PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12.45PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	1.1&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Definitions
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 9.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10.85PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
	In this Agreement the following terms have the following meanings, respectively:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 1PT">
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Agreement"
</FONT>
	means this arrangement agreement entered into between the Parties as first referenced above, including Exhibit A hereto and all amendments made hereto;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 23.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 20PT">
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Almaden Common Shares"
</FONT>
	means the common shares in the authorized share structure of Almaden;
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Almaden Securityholders"
</FONT>
	means Almaden Shareholders and the holders of Almaden Stock Options;
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Almaden Shareholders"
</FONT>
	means the holders of Almaden Common Shares;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 9PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 1PT">
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Almaden Stock Option"
</FONT>
	means an option to acquire Almaden Common Shares granted pursuant to Almaden Stock Option Plan;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 9.2PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 1PT">
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Almaden Stock Option Plan"
</FONT>
	means the Almaden stock option plan approved by Almaden Shareholders on June 28, 2011;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.3PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 9PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 1PT">
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Almaden Warrants"
</FONT>
	means common share purchase warrants of Almaden exercisable to acquire Almaden Common Shares;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.3PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 1PT">
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Arrangement Resolution"
</FONT>
	means the special resolution of Almaden Shareholders authorizing and approving the Plan of Arrangement;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 9PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 1PT">
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Authority"
</FONT>
	means any: (i) multinational, federal, provincial, state, municipal, local or foreign governmental or public department, court, or commission, domestic or foreign; (ii) subdivision or authority of any of the foregoing; or (iii) quasi-govemmental or self-regulatory organization exercising any regulatory, expropriation or taxing authority under or for the account of its members or any of the above;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 8.8PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 1PT">
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Business Day"
</FONT>
	means a day which is not a Saturday, Sunday or a day when commercial banks are not open for business in Vancouver, British Columbia;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 8.8PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 1PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER" ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: NORMAL; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL" ID="DSPFPAGENUMBER">

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.75PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 1PT">
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Circular"
</FONT>
	means the information circular, together with all appendices, distributed by Almaden in connection with the Meeting;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 23.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Closing"
</FONT>
	means the completion of the transactions contemplated by this Agreement;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 23.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Court"
</FONT>
	means the Supreme Court of British Columbia;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 23.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Dissent Rights"
</FONT>
	has the meaning attributed to that term in Section 3.1 in the Plan of Arrangement;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.3PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10.45PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 1PT">
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Effective Date"
</FONT>
	means the second Business Day after the date upon which the Parties have confirmed in writing (such confirmation not to be unreasonably withheld or delayed) that all conditions to the completion of the Plan of Arrangement have been satisfied or waived in accordance with Article 4 of the Arrangement Agreement and all documents and instruments required under the Arrangement Agreement, the Plan of Arrangement and the Final Order have been delivered;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 9.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 11.1PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Effective Time"
</FONT>
	means 12:01 a.m. on the Effective Date;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 9PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 1PT">
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Encumbrance"
</FONT>
	means a mortgage, charge, pledge, lien, hypothec, security interest, encumbrance, adverse claim or a right of third parties to acquire or restrict the use of property;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 9.2PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 1PT">
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Final Order"
</FONT>
	means the order made after application to the Court pursuant to section 291 of the
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
	Business Corporations Act
</FONT>
	(British Columbia) approving the Plan of Arrangement as such order may be amended by the Court (with the consent of the Parties, acting reasonably) at any time prior to the Effective Date or, if appealed, then, unless such appeal is withdrawn or denied, as affirmed or as amended (with the consent of the Parties, acting reasonably) on appeal, which order shall include a statement to the following effect: "The terms and conditions of the Plan of Arrangement are procedurally and substantially fair to Almaden Shareholders and are hereby approved by the Court. This Order will serve as a basis of a claim to an exemption pursuant to section 3(a)( 10) of the United States Securities Act of 1933, as amended, from the registration requirements otherwise imposed by that Act regarding the issuance of securities under the Plan of Arrangement";
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.3PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 8.8PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 1PT">
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Interim Order"
</FONT>
	means the order made after application to the Court pursuant to section 291 of the
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
	Business Corporations Act
</FONT>
	(British Columbia), providing for, among other things, the calling and holding of the Meeting, as such order may be amended, supplemented or varied by the Court (with the consent of the Parties, acting reasonably);
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10.6PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 1PT">
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Meeting"
</FONT>
	means the annual general and special meeting of Almaden Shareholders scheduled to be held on June 18, 2015 and any adjoumment(s) or postponement(s) thereof, to be called to consider, and if deemed advisable, approve the Almaden Resolution;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 9.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 11.1PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Parties"
</FONT>
	means, together, Almaden and Spinco and
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Party"
</FONT>
	means any one of them;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10.6PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 1PT">
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Plan of Arrangement"
</FONT>
	means the plan of arrangement set out as Exhibit A hereto as the same may be amended from time to time in accordance with the terms thereof and hereof;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 9.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Representative"
</FONT>
	means any director, officer, employee, agent, advisor or consultant of either Party;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 9PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2PT">

</FONT>
	means the
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
	Securities Act
</FONT>
	(British Columbia) together with all rules and regulations promulgated thereunder or with respect thereto;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10.6PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2PT">

</FONT>
	means the Securities Act and the equivalent law in the other applicable provinces and territories of Canada, and the published policies, instruments, rules, judgments, orders and decisions of any Authority administering those statutes, as well as the rules, regulations, by-laws and policies of the Toronto Stock Exchange and the TSX Venture Exchange, as applicable;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 9.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 11.1PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">

</FONT>
	means the common shares in the authorized share structure of Spinco; and
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 9.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 11.1PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 10PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH" ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER" ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: NORMAL; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL" ID="DSPFPAGENUMBER">
	- 2 -
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS" ID="DSPFPAGEBREAK">
<HR STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0PX; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000; MARGIN: 4PX 0PX; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0PX; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0PX; HEIGHT: 2PX; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: BOTH; BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0PX" NOSHADE="NOSHADE">
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage132"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2PT">
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Transferred Assets"
</FONT>
	means the assets to be transferred to Spinco prior to the completion of the Plan of Arrangement, which assets include: (a) a 2% net smelter returns royalty in respect of production from the Mor project, the Cabin Lake project, the Caribou Creek project, the Goz Creek project, the Meister River project, the Tim project, the Ram project and the Prospector Mountain project, which are located in the Yukon; (b) a 2% net smelter returns royalty in respect of production from the Erika project, the La Bufa project, the El Pulpo project, the San Pedro Fraccion 1 project, the San Pedro Fraccion 2 project, the Yago/Gallo de Oro project, the Mezquites project, the Llano Grande project, the San Pedro project and the Ixtaca/Tuligtic project located in Mexico; (c) a 2% net smelters return royalty in respect of production from the Prospect Valley project, the Elk project and the Dill project located in British Columbia; (d) a 2% net smelter returns royalty in respect of production from the BP project and the Blackjack Springs project located in Nevada; (e) a 1.5% net smelter returns royalty in respect of production from the Caballo Blanco project located in Mexico; (f) Almaden's interest in the Tropico project joint venture; (g) Almaden's interests in its wholly-owned Canadian subsidiaries, Pangeon Holdings Ltd., Ixtaca Precious Metals Inc. and Republic Resources Inc.; (h) Almaden's interests in its wholly-owned American subsidiary, Almaden America Inc.; (i) Almaden's interests in its Mexican subsidiaries, Compania Minera Zapata, S.A. de C.V., Almaden de Mexico, S.A. de C.V. and Minera Gavilan, S.A. de C.V.; (j) Almaden's interests in ATW Resources Inc., and Almaden's interests in the ATW project joint venture; (k) Almaden's gold inventory and certain marketable securities, including Almaden's interest in Gold Mountain Mining Corp.; (1) Canadian mineral tenures in respect of the Ponderosa project, the Nicoamen River project, the Merit project, the Munro Lake project, the Skoonka Creek project and the Logan project; (m) reclamation deposits related to the Ponderosa project, the Nicoamen project, the Merit project and the Willow project; and (n) an initial investment of working capital in an amount to be agreed to by Almaden and Spinco, acting reasonably.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 23.3PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT">

</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.3PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 1PT">
	reference to a statute or code includes every regulation made pursuant thereto, all amendments to the statute or code or to any such regulation in force from time to time, and any statute, code or regulation which supplements or supersedes such statute, code or regulation.
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14PT; FONT-FAMILY: CORDIAUPC, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 5PT; FONT-SIZE: 14PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.3PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 1PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.3PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 1PT">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10.6PT; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	ARTICLE 2
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10.6PT; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	REPRESENTATIONS AND WARRANTIES
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 23.3PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	2.1&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Mutual Representations and Warranties of Spinco and Almaden
</DIV>

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
	and acknowledges that the o
</FONT>
	ther Party is relying upon such representations and warranties in connection with the matters contemplated by this Agreement:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT">
	&#160;

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 23.3PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 11.1PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	2.4&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Survival of Representations and Warranties
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 9.5PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10.85PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT">
	The representations and warranties of each of the Parties contained herein will survive the execution and delivery of this Agreement and will terminate on the earlier of the termination of this Agreement in accordance with its terms and the Effective Time.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.3PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12.45PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 1PT">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10.6PT; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	ARTICLE 3
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10.6PT; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	COVENANTS
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 9.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12.45PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	3.1&#160;
<FONT STYLE="WIDTH: 9PT; DISPLAY: INLINE-BLOCK; FONT-SIZE: 1PX" ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	Mutual Covenants of Spinco and Almaden
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 9.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 11.1PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
	Each of Spinco and Almaden covenants with the other Party that it will:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12.2PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="B0602D7524AD40679F68F893D475D5B4" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33.8PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	use commercially reasonable efforts and do all things reasonably required of it to cause the Plan of Arrangement to become effective on or before August 31, 2015;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.3PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 11.8PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="9ABE82CCD912473C866EE9954845B91C" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33.8PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	do and perform all such acts and things, and execute and deliver all such agreements, assurances, notices and other documents and instruments as may reasonably be required, both prior to and after the Effective Date, to facilitate the carrying out of the intent and purposes of this Agreement;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12.2PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="234A44769FDB44A3BC74873BF21AC40D" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33.8PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	use commercially reasonable efforts to cause each of the conditions precedent set forth in Article 4, which are within its control, to be satisfied on or prior to June 30, 2015; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.3PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 11.8PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="37137F9C0E4F466999E911DE52EF665B" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33.8PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(d)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	indemnify and save harmless the other Party from and against any and all liabilities, claims, demands, losses, costs, damages and expenses to which such Party or any of its Representatives may be subject or may suffer, in any way caused by, or arising, directly or indirectly, from or in consequence of:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 72PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="420E7AC823744604814301D8A34B7D13" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; WIDTH: 36PT">
	(i)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 5PX; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	any misrepresentation or alleged misrepresentation
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
	in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
<FONT STYLE="WIDTH: 1.7PT; DISPLAY: INLINE-BLOCK; FONT-SIZE: 1PX">
	&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
	any information included
</FONT>
</FONT>
	in
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
	the Circular that is provided by the other Party for the purpose of inclusion in the Circular; and
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 72PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 72PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="697A365C8DA74E50AEC1A0365172D61D" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
	(ii)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 5PX; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	indemnify and save harmless the other Party from and against any and all liabilities, claims, demands, losses, costs, damages and expenses to which such Party or any of its Representatives may be subject or may suffer, in any way caused by, or arising, directly or indirectly, from or in consequence of:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 72PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 9.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12.7PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	3.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="WIDTH: 9PT; DISPLAY: INLINE-BLOCK; FONT-SIZE: 1PX" ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB">
	&#160;
</FONT>
	Covenants of Almaden
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 9.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 11.1PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
	Almaden hereby covenants and agrees with Spinco that it will:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="21EF3153718D4E2F95D48338CC5E9F76" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33.8PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
	until the Effective Date, not perform any act or enter into any transaction which
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
	interferes&#160;or is inconsistent with the completion of the Plan of Arrangement;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 9.5PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 11.3PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="CFD7C606D2C14DF9BB1C0D870F459F33" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33.8PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	apply to the Court for the Interim Order;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.3PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="22EB5F4AEDA84DEA84FB0F0311F0F30E" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33.8PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
	solicit proxies to be voted at the Meeting in favour of the Arrangement Resolution
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
	and prepare, as soon as practicable, the Circular and proxy solicitation materials and any amendments or supplements thereto as required by, and in compliance with, the Interim Order, and applicable law, and, subject to receipt of the Interim Order, convene the Meeting as ordered by the Interim Order and conduct the Meeting in accordance with the Interim Order and as otherwise required by law;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.3PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 10PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH" ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA">

</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
	in a timely and expeditious manner, filethe Circular in all jurisdictions where the same is required to be filed by it and mail the same to the holders of Almaden Shares in accordance with the Interim Order and applicable law;
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.3PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.3PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="1CF4DBEA4FCE4C6EAD1AAFE989B08030" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33.8PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(e)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
	ensure that the information set forth in the Circular relating to Almaden and its
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 9PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
	subsidiaries, and their respective businesses and properties and the effect of the Plan of Arrangement thereon will be true, correct and complete in all material respects and will not contain any untrue statement of any material fact or omit to state any material fact required to be stated therein or necessary in order to make the statements therein not misleading in light of the circumstances in which they are made;
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.3PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.3PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="DF2BCBB27CBD412CAD2C4B399D8C53EE" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR STYLE="HEIGHT: 26PX">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 47PX; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(f)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	without limiting the generality of any of the foregoing covenants, until the Effective
</FONT>
	Date, except as required to effect the Plan of Arrangement or with the consent of Spinco, will not:
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 37PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.3PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 8.8PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="A9750B12C7484B49864F61DB9EB0EBE2" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

</TD>

	(i)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	issue any additional Almaden Common Shares or other securities of Almaden except pursuant to the exercise of Almaden Stock Options or Almaden Warrants outstanding prior to the date hereof or in connection with the Plan of Arrangement or transactions required in order to effect the Plan of Arrangement;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 9PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="2E208FF7BE2D4769873AE438CC367EB1" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	issue or enter into any agreement or agreements to issue or grant options, warrants or rights to purchase any Almaden Common Shares or other securities of Almaden;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 9PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="482E0A01EF6946A8A40E5153600C093A" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

	alter or amend its constating documents as the same exist at the date of this Agreement except as specifically provided for hereunder;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 9PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="9EF8A07080074522BC1BB0DC81ADB6FB" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
	prior to the Effective Date, make application to the applicable regulatory authorities for such orders under applicable securities and/or corporate laws as may be necessary or desirable in connection with the Plan of Arrangement; and
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 9PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="C5179EF2D0AE4C98958243CA2F9FEFD6" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
	perform the obligations required to be performed by it under the Plan of Arrangement and
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 8.8PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
	do all such other acts and things as may be necessary or desirable and are within its power and control in order to carry out and give effect to the Plan of Arrangement, including using commercially reasonable efforts to obtain:
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 9.2PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="9808FAA60CCF4FB1B17159387CDCF6C2" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

	(i)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	the approval of Almaden Shareholders required for the implementation of the Plan of Arrangement;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.3PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 9PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="4FED1256C1044169BEB7C64B2CBE6E0A" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 73PT">
</TD>

	(ii)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	the consent to the Plan of Arrangement of the holders of Almaden Stock Options;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.3PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 9PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="400AC6434B0D412496F2108D491F6A16" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 73PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 34.05PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(iii)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	the Interim Order and, subject to the obtaining of all required consents, orders, rulings and approvals (including required approval of Almaden Shareholders), the Final Order;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.3PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="753D3AED22D04C3BBF4447C1109CF6E6" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 73PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 34.05PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(iv)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	such other consents, orders, rulings or approvals and assurances as are necessary or desirable for the implementation of the Plan of Arrangement, including those referred to in Article 4; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.3PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 23.5PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="331AFD9FB2214A86A9970B1A723771C1" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 73PT">
</TD>

	(v)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	satisfaction of the conditions precedent referred to in Article 4.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 10PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH" ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER" ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: NORMAL; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL" ID="DSPFPAGENUMBER">
	- 7 -
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS" ID="DSPFPAGEBREAK">
<HR STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0PX; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000; MARGIN: 4PX 0PX; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0PX; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0PX; HEIGHT: 2PX; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: BOTH; BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0PX" NOSHADE="NOSHADE">
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage137"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 23.5PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'COURIER NEW', MONOSPACE; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	3.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="WIDTH: 9PT; DISPLAY: INLINE-BLOCK; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD" ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Covenants of Spinco
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 23.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
	Spinco hereby covenants and agrees with Almaden that it will:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="95AB88EBD7E14A85BC647745F4A28C52" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 37PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33.7PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
	until the Effective Date, not perform any act or enter into any transaction which
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
	interferes
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; TEXT-INDENT: -36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 9PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 108PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
	or is inconsistent with the completion of the Plan of Arrangement;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 9PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="4A3D010010F442D9A13954C374F3D85D" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 37PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33.7PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	cooperate with and support Almaden in its application for the Interim Order and preparation of the Circular;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="34374A5934C74E76A2548156F11C267F" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 37PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33.7PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
	without limiting the generality of any of the foregoing covenants, until the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
	Effective
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 9.2PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 73PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2PT">
	Date, except as required to effect the Plan of Arrangement or with the consent of Almaden, not:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.3PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 8.8PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="ED5C48C737704F21A773379D9E9E834F" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(i)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	issue any additional Spinco Common Shares or other securities of Spinco other than in connection with the Plan of Arrangement or transactions required in order to effect the Plan of Arrangement;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 9PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="81A1E4EAEF28487BB9EB8CC173B47DB0" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(ii)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	issue or enter into any agreement or agreements to issue or grant options, warrants or rights to purchase any Spinco Common Shares or other securities of Spinco; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 9PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="F5D9501913134474AA9B71EDD5907DC1" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

</TD>

	(iii)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	alter or amend its constating documents as the same exist at the date of this Agreement except as specifically provided for hereunder; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 9.2PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="50218346B8EC4811A48B4B070472EF55" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

	(d)

<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	perform the obligations required to be performed by it under the Plan of Arrangement and do all such other acts and things as may be necessary or desirable and are within its power and control in order to carry out and give effect to the Plan of Arrangement, including using commercially reasonable efforts to obtain:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.3PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10.45PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="C6B76DB39E15408BAB165B2418EE9112" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

</TD>

<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="FE0E9505004542B5B894185A4B40A2EB" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

</TD>

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 9.5PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10.85PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'COURIER NEW', MONOSPACE; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	3.4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="WIDTH: 9PT; DISPLAY: INLINE-BLOCK; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD" ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Interim Order
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10.6PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2PT">
	As soon as practicable after the date hereof, Almaden shall apply to the Court for the Interim Order providing for, among other things, the calling and holding of the Meeting.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 9.5PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 11.1PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'COURIER NEW', MONOSPACE; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	3.5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="WIDTH: 9PT; DISPLAY: INLINE-BLOCK; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD" ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Final Order
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 9.2PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2PT">
	If the Interim Order and all securityholder approvals required in respect of the Plan of Arrangement are obtained, Almaden shall promptly thereafter take the necessary steps to submit the Plan of Arrangement to the Court and apply for the Final Order in such fashion as the Court may direct, and as soon as practicable following receipt of the Final Order, and subject to the satisfaction or waiver of the other conditions provided for in Article 4 hereof, Almaden and Spinco shall complete the Plan of Arrangement on the Effective Date pursuant to the Final Order.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 9.2PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.3PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10.45PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 2PT; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	ARTICLE 4
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.3PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10.45PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 2PT; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	CONDITIONS
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 9.5PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10.85PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'COURIER NEW', MONOSPACE; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	4.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="WIDTH: 9PT; DISPLAY: INLINE-BLOCK; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD" ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Mutual Conditions Precedent
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2PT">
	The respective obligations of the Parties to complete the transactions contemplated by this Agreement and otherwise to give effect to the Plan of Arrangement shall be subject to the satisfaction of the following conditions:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 10PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH" ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER" ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: NORMAL; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL" ID="DSPFPAGENUMBER">
	- 8 -
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS" ID="DSPFPAGEBREAK">

</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage138"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 9PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="37C4E15C82D04E7EA0B23FA7AD69B589" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33.05PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	the Interim Order shall not have been set aside or modified in a manner unacceptable to any of the Parties, acting reasonably, on appeal or otherwise;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 9PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="7E9F24C885404C04A5EAB23D76282481" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>

	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	the Arrangement Resolution shall have been approved by the required number of votes cast by Almaden Shareholders at the Meeting;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 9PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="EFD61A3EC3884E2EAC682DCC37AFF692" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33.05PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	the Court shall have determined that the terms and conditions of the exchange of Almaden Common Shares for Spinco Common Shares in the Plan of Arrangement are procedurally and substantively fair to Almaden Shareholders, and the Final Order shall have been obtained in form and substance satisfactory to all Parties, each acting reasonably, not later than August 31, 2015 or such later date as the Parties may agree;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 9PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="3F0F4CA84A9642CABF66161C2DB78DAE" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33.05PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(d)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	the consent to the Plan of Arrangement of the holders of Almaden Stock Options shall have been obtained in form and substance satisfactory to the Parties;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 9.2PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="320ACDC526E044FB85EA1DE5AC61E531" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33.05PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(e)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	the transfer of the Transferred Assets from Almaden to Spinco shall have been completed to the satisfaction of the Parties, acting reasonably;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.3PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 9PT">

</TD>

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 9.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10.85PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	4.2
<FONT STYLE="WIDTH: 9PT; DISPLAY: INLINE-BLOCK; FONT-SIZE: 1PX" ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB">
	&#160;

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	Additional Conditions toObligations of Each Party
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10.6PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 1PT">
	The obligation of each Party to complete the transactions contemplated by this Agreement is further subject to the condition, which may be waived by such Party without prejudice to its right to rely on any other condition in its favour, that the covenants of the other Party to be performed on or before the Effective Date pursuant to the terms of this Agreement shall have been duly performed by it and that the representations and warranties of the other Party shall be true and correct in all material respects as at the Effective Date (except for representations and warrants made as of the specified date, the accuracy of which shall be determined as at that specified date), with the same effect as if such representations and warranties had been made at, and as of, such time and each such Party shall receive a certificate, dated the Effective Date, of a senior officer of each other Party confirming the same.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 9.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10.85PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">

</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10.6PT; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">

</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 9.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 11.1PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	5.1

</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&#160;Amendment and Waiver
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 9PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 1PT">
	This Agreement may, at any time and from time to time before and after the holding of the Meeting, but not later than the Effective Date, be amended by the written agreement of the Parties without, subject to applicable law, further notice to or authorization on the part of their respective shareholders. Without limiting the generality of the foregoing, any such amendment may:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 9PT">

</FONT>
</DIV>

	This Agreement may, at any time prior to the Plan of Arrangement becoming effective under the provisions of the
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">

</FONT>
	(British Columbia) and without approval of Almaden Securityholders, be terminated by the mutual agreement of the Parties.

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10.6PT; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	ARTICLE 6
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10.6PT; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	GENERAL
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 9.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 11.1PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	6.1
<FONT STYLE="WIDTH: 9PT; DISPLAY: INLINE-BLOCK; FONT-SIZE: 1PX" ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	Severability
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 13.6PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 1PT">
	If any term or other provision of this Agreement is invalid, illegal or incapable of being enforced by any rule, law, or public policy, all other conditions and provisions of this Agreement will nevertheless remain in full force and effect so long as the economic or legal substance of the transactions contemplated by this Agreement is not affected in any manner materially adverse to any Party. Upon any determination that any term or other provision is invalid, illegal or incapable of being enforced, the Parties will negotiate in good faith to modify this Agreement so as to effect the original intent of the Parties as closely as possible in an acceptable manner to the end that the transactions contemplated by this Agreement are fulfilled to the fullest extent possible.
</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 9.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 11.1PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 13.6PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 1PT">
	This Agreement will be binding upon and enure to the benefit of the Parties and their respective successors and permitted assigns from time to time.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 9.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 11.15PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 12PT">

	&#160;

<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	Assignment
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.75PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12.2PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 1PT">
	This Agreement may not be assigned by any Party without the prior written consent of each of the other Parties.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 13.6PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 1PT">
	Notwithstanding anything to the contrary contained herein, each Party shall have the right, without being released, to transfer or assign this Agreement to any third party as security for any
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
	bona fide
</FONT>
	financing or as security for any guarantee granted by such transferor in respect of the obligations of its affiliates to such third party for any
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
	bona fide
</FONT>
	financing.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 9.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10.9PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	6.4
<FONT STYLE="WIDTH: 9PT; DISPLAY: INLINE-BLOCK; FONT-SIZE: 1PX" ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	Governing Law
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.75PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12.2PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 1PT">
	This Agreement will be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Province of British Columbia and the federal laws of Canada applicable therein.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 2.6PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 1PT">
	Each Party agrees that any action or proceeding arising out of or relating to this Agreement may be instituted in the courts of British Columbia, waives any objection which it may have now or later to the venue of that action or proceeding, irrevocably submits to the non-exclusive jurisdiction of those courts in that action or proceeding and agrees to be bound by any judgement of those courts.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 23.3PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	6.5
<FONT STYLE="WIDTH: 9PT; DISPLAY: INLINE-BLOCK; FONT-SIZE: 1PX" ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB">
	&#160;
</FONT>
	T
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	ime of Essence
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 23.3PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
	Time is of the essence in respect of this Agreement.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 23.3PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	6.6
<FONT STYLE="WIDTH: 9PT; DISPLAY: INLINE-BLOCK; FONT-SIZE: 1PX" ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB">
	&#160;
</FONT>
	E
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	ntire Agreement
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 13.6PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 1PT">
	This Agreement, the Plan of Arrangement and the other agreements contemplated hereby and thereby constitute the entire agreement between the Parties pertaining to the subject matter hereof. There are no warranties, conditions, or representations (including any that may be implied by statute) and there are no agreements in connection with such subject matter, except as specifically set forth or referred to in this Agreement or as otherwise set out in writing and delivered at Closing. No reliance is placed on any warranty, representation, opinion, advice or assertion of fact made by any Party or its directors, officers, employees or agents, to any other Party or its directors, officers, employees or agents, except to the extent that the same has been reduced to writing and included as a term of this Agreement. Accordingly, there will be no liability, either in tort or in contract, assessed in relation to any such warranty, representation, opinion, advice or assertion of fact, except to the extent aforesaid.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 9.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10.85PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	6.7
<FONT STYLE="WIDTH: 9PT; DISPLAY: INLINE-BLOCK; FONT-SIZE: 1PX" ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	Further Assurances
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 1PT">
	Each of the Parties hereto will promptly do, make, execute or deliver, or cause to be done, made, executed or delivered, all such further acts, documents and things as the other Party hereto may reasonably require from time to time for the purpose of giving effect to this Agreement and will use reasonable efforts and take all such steps as may reasonably be within its power to implement to their full extent the provisions of this Agreement.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 1PT">

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 9.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'COURIER NEW', MONOSPACE; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10.85PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
