	EXHIBIT A
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 9.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'COURIER NEW', MONOSPACE; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10.85PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10.6PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	PLAN OF ARRANGEMENT
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10.6PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	UNDER SECTION 288 OF THE
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
	BUSINESS CORPORATIONS ACT
</FONT>
	(BRITISH COLUMBIA)
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'COURIER NEW', MONOSPACE; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10.6PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10.6PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	ARTICLE 1 DEFINITIONS AND INTERPRETATION
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 9.5PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 11.1PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'COURIER NEW', MONOSPACE; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF">
	1.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="WIDTH: 9PT; DISPLAY: INLINE-BLOCK; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 1PX" ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
<U>
	Definitions
</U>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 9.2PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2PT">
	In this Plan of Arrangement, unless there is something in the subject matter or context inconsistent therewith, the following terms shall have the respective meanings set forth below:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.3PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 9PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2PT">
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"5 Day VWAP"
</FONT>
	at any particular time in respect of a security means the volume weighted average price of the security on the principal exchange on which the security is traded for the five day period beginning at that time;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.3PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 9PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2PT">
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Almaden"
</FONT>
	means Almaden Minerals Ltd., a company incorporated under the laws of the Province of British Columbia;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.3PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 9PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2PT">
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Almaden Common Shares"
</FONT>
	means the Common shares in the authorized share structure of Almaden whose identifying name is changed to "Class A Common shares" pursuant to this Plan of Arrangement;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.3PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 9PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2PT">
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Almaden Class B Common Shares"
</FONT>
	means the Class
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	B
</FONT>
	Common shares in the authorized share structure of Almaden created pursuant to this Plan of Arrangement;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.3PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 9PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2PT">
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Almaden Replacement Stock Option"
</FONT>
	means an option to acquire an Almaden Class
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	B
</FONT>
	Common Share granted by Almaden to a holder of an Almaden Stock Option pursuant to an Option Exchange, with the exercise price of each such Almaden Replacement Stock Option determined in accordance with this Plan of Arrangement and the other terms and conditions of each such Almaden Replacement Stock Option determined in accordance with the Almaden Stock Option Plan and any agreements thereunder including, where necessary, appropriate adjustments to any performance-based or other vesting conditions, as such plan and agreements may be amended by the board of directors of Almaden or a committee thereof;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.3PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 9PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2PT">
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Almaden Replacement Warrant"
</FONT>
	means a warrant to acquire an Almaden Class B Common Share to be issued by Alamden to a holder of an Almaden Warrant pursuant a Warrant Exchange, with the exercise price of each such Almaden Replacement Warrant determined in accordance with this Plan of Arrangement and the other terms and conditions of the Almaden Replacement Warrant being those of the Almaden Warrant,
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
	mutatis mutandis,
</FONT>
	subject to such reasonable adjustment as may be necessary in the circumstances and are approved by the Board of Directors of Almaden;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.3PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10.45PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2PT">
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Almaden Resolution"
</FONT>
	means the special resolution of Almaden Shareholders approving the Plan of Arrangement;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 9.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 11.2PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Almaden Shareholder"
</FONT>
	means, at a particular time, a holder of one or more Almaden Common Shares;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.05PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 8.8PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2PT">
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Almaden Stock Option"
</FONT>
	means an option granted pursuant to the Almaden Stock Option Plan exercisable to acquire an Almaden Common Share;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.3PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 9PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2PT">
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Almaden Stock Option Plan"
</FONT>
	means the Almaden stock option plan approved by Almaden Shareholders on June
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	28, 2011;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.3PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2PT">
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Almaden Warrant"
</FONT>
	means a common share purchase warrant of Almaden exercisable to acquire an Almaden Common Share;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 9.2PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 1PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 10PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH" ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER" ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: NORMAL; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL" ID="DSPFPAGENUMBER">
	A-1
</FONT>

<A NAME="eolPage143"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 9.2PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 1PT">
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Arrangement Agreement"
</FONT>
	means the agreement dated May 11, 2015 between Almaden and Spinco to which this Plan of Arrangement is attached as Exhibit A, as it may be supplemented or amended from time to time;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.3PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 1PT">
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Business Day"
</FONT>
	means a day which is not a Saturday, Sunday, or a day when commercial banks are not open for business in Vancouver, British Columbia;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 23.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Court"
</FONT>
	means the Supreme Court of British Columbia;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 23.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Computershare"
</FONT>
	means Computershare Trust Company of Canada;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 23.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Dissent Rights"
</FONT>
	has the meaning attributed to that term in Section 3.1 of this Plan of Arrangement;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 23.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Dissent Share"
</FONT>
	has the meaning attributed to that term in Subsection 2.2(a) of this Plan of Arrangement;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.3PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 9PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 1PT">
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Dissenting Shareholder"
</FONT>
	means a registered Almaden Shareholder that has duly exercised its Dissent Rights and has not withdrawn or been deemed to have withdrawn such exercise of Dissent Rights, but only in respect of the Almaden Common Shares in respect of which Dissent Rights are validly exercised by such Almaden Shareholder;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.3PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10.45PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 1PT">
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Effective Date"
</FONT>
	means the second Business Day after the date upon which the Parties have confirmed in writing (such confirmation not to be unreasonably withheld or delayed) that all conditions to the completion of the Plan of Arrangement have been satisfied or waived in accordance with Article 5 of the Arrangement Agreement and all documents and instruments required under the Arrangement Agreement, the Plan of Arrangement and the Final Order have been delivered;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 9.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 11.1PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Effective Time"
</FONT>
	means 12:01 a.m. on the Effective Date;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 9.2PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 1PT">
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Eligible Dividend"
</FONT>
	has the meaning attributed to that tenn in subsection 89(1) of the
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
	Income Tax Act
</FONT>
	(Canada);
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.3PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 9PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 1PT">
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Final Order"
</FONT>
	means the order made after application to the Court pursuant to section 291 of the
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
	Business Corporations Act
</FONT>
	(British Columbia) approving the Plan of Arrangement as such order may be amended by the Court (with the consent of the Parties, acting reasonably) at any time prior to the Effective Date or, if appealed, then, unless such appeal is withdrawn or denied, as affirmed or as amended (with the consent of the Parties, acting reasonably) on appeal, which order shall include a statement to the following effect: "The terms and conditions of the Plan of Arrangement are procedurally and substantially fair to Almaden Shareholders and are hereby approved by the Court. This Order will serve as a basis of a claim to an exemption pursuant to section 3(a)(10) of the United States Securities Act of 1933, as amended, from the registration requirements otherwise imposed by that Act regarding the issuance of securities under the Plan of Arrangement";
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.3PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 9PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 1PT">
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Fractional Share Amount"
</FONT>
	means, in respect of an Almaden Shareholder, the aggregate number of Spinco Common Shares that the Almaden Shareholder would be entitled to receive on the Share Exchange in the absence of the Round Down Provision, less the aggregate number of Spinco Common Shares that the Almaden Shareholder is entitled to receive on the Share Exchange having regard to the Round Down Provision;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.3PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 8.8PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 1PT">
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"In the Money Amount"
</FONT>
	at a particular time with respect to an Almaden Stock Option, Almaden Replacement Stock Option, or Spinco Replacement Stock Option means the amount, if any, by which the fair market value of the relevant underlying security exceeds the exercise price of the relevant option at the particular time;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 10PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH" ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER" ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: NORMAL; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL" ID="DSPFPAGENUMBER">
	A-2
</FONT>
</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 9PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 1PT">
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Interim Order"
</FONT>
	means the order made after application to the Court pursuant to section 291 of the
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
	Business Corporations Act
</FONT>
	(British Columbia), providing for, among other things, the calling and holding of the Meeting, as such order may be amended, supplemented or varied by the Court (with the consent of the Parties, acting reasonably);
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 8.8PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2PT">
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Meeting"
</FONT>
	means the annual general and special meeting of Almaden Shareholders scheduled to be held on June 18, 2015 and any adjoumment(s) or postponement(s) thereof, to be called to consider, and if deemed advisable, approve the Almaden Resolution;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.75PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10.8PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2PT">
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Option Exchange"
</FONT>
	has the meaning attributed to that term in Subsection 2.2(d) of this Plan of Arrangement;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 9.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 11.1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Parties"
</FONT>
	means Almaden and Spinco;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 8.8PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2PT">
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Plan of Arrangement, "hereof', "herein", "hereunder"
</FONT>
	and similar expressions means this plan of arrangement, including the appendices hereto, and any amendments, variations or supplements hereto made in accordance with the terms hereof and the terms of the Arrangement Agreement or made at the direction of the Court in the Final Order;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.75PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 9.2PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2PT">
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Round Down Provision"
</FONT>
	has the meaning attributed to that term in of Section 2.3 of this Plan of Arrangement;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 8.8PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2PT">
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Share Exchange"
</FONT>
	has the meaning attributed to that term in Subsection 2.2(f) of this Plan of Arrangement;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.75PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10.8PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2PT">
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Spinco"
</FONT>
	means Almadex Minerals Limited, a company incorporated under the laws of the Province of British Columbia;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 9.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 11.05PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Spinco Common Shares"
</FONT>
	means the common shares in the authorized share structure of Spinco;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.3PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 8.8PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2PT">
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Spinco Replacement Stock Option"
</FONT>
	means an option to acquire .6 of a Spinco Common Share granted by Spinco to a holder of an Almaden Stock Option pursuant to an Option Exchange, with the exercise price of each such Spinco Replacement Stock Option determined in accordance with this Plan of Arrangement and the other terms and conditions of each such Spinco Replacement Stock Option determined in accordance with the Spinco Stock Option Plan and any agreements thereunder and including, where necessary, appropriate adjustments to any performance-based or other vesting conditions, as such plan or agreements may be amended by the board of directors of Spinco or a committee thereof;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10.6PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2PT">
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Spinco Replacement Warrant"
</FONT>
	means a warrant to acquire .6 of a Spinco Common Share issued by Spinco to a holder of an Almaden Warrant pursuant to a Warrant Exchange, with the exercise price of each such Spinco Replacement Warrant determined in accordance with this Plan of Arrangement and the other terms and conditions of the Spinco Replacement Warrant being those of the Almaden Warrant,
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
	mutatis mutandis,
</FONT>
	subject to such reasonable adjustment as may be necessary in the circumstances and are approved by the Board of Directors of Spinco;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 9.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 11.1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Spinco Stock Option Plan"
</FONT>
	means the Spinco stock option plan;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 8.8PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2PT">

</FONT>
	has the meaning attributed to that term in Subsection 2.2(c) of this Plan of Arrangement; and
</DIV>

</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2PT">
	Unless otherwise expressly provided herein, any reference in this Plan of Arrangement to a statute includes all regulations made thereunder, all amendments to such statute or regulations in force from time to time, and any statute or regulation that supplements or supersedes such statute or regulations.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'COURIER NEW', MONOSPACE; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 13.6PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 13.6PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	ARTICLE 2
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 13.6PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	THE ARRANGEMENT
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 9.5PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 11.1PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'COURIER NEW', MONOSPACE; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	2.1
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
<U>
	Effectiveness
</U>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 13.6PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2PT">
	Subject to the terms of the Arrangement Agreement, the Arrangement will become effective at the Effective Time and be binding at and after the Effective Time on: (i) Spinco, (ii) Almaden, (iii) Almaden Shareholders, (iv) holders of Almaden Stock Options, and (v) holders of Almaden Warrants.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 9.5PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 11.1PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'COURIER NEW', MONOSPACE; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	2.2
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
<U>
	The Arrangement
</U>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12.2PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2PT">
	Commencing at the Effective Time, the events and transactions set out in Subsections (a) to (g) inclusive will occur and be deemed to occur in the order set out below without any further act or formality, and with each event or transaction occurring and being deemed to occur immediately after the occurrence of the immediately preceding event or transaction:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.3PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 13.45PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="784189807B45468D8C2215F468D22B12" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33.1PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
	Each Almaden Common Share in respect of which an Almaden Shareholder has exercised Dissent Rights and for which the Almaden Shareholder is ultimately entitled to be paid fair value (each a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Dissent Share")
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
	shall be deemed to have been repurchased by Almaden for cancellation in consideration for a debt-claim against Almaden to be paid the fair value of such Dissent Share in accordance with Article 3 of this Plan of Arrangement, net of any applicable withholding tax, and such Dissent Share shall thereupon be cancelled;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 9.5PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 11.3PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="D92539E34D54460A94A785064C777E8B" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33.1PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	The authorized share structure of Almaden shall be reorganized and altered by
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.3PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="94FC1333049546EBB327AB3DAE0E7981" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 35.75PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(i)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	changing the identifying name of the issued and unissued Almaden Common Shares from "Common shares" to "Class A Common shares" and amending the special rights and restrictions attached to such shares to provide the holders thereof with two votes in respect of each share held, and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.3PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.3PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="2EC59C75B35D4B44BB64B71D4DCDAF2A" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 35.75PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(ii)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	creating a new class of shares without par value issuable in an unlimited number with the identifying name "Class B Common shares" having special rights and restrictions identical to those attaching to the Almaden Common Shares prior to the amendments described in paragraph (b)(i) above;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.3PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 10PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH" ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER" ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: NORMAL; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL" ID="DSPFPAGENUMBER">
	A-4
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS" ID="DSPFPAGEBREAK">
<HR STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0PX; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000; MARGIN: 4PX 0PX; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0PX; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0PX; HEIGHT: 2PX; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: BOTH; BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0PX" NOSHADE="NOSHADE">
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage146"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10.6PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="9B091C5D152A4E71BF6E3C8D13DCE6A0" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33.7PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
	The issued and outstanding Spinco Common Shares shall be subdivided into that number of Spinco Common Shares (the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Subdivision")
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
	determined by the following formula:
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 9.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12.45PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 72PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
	A-B
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 9.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 11.1PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 72PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
	where
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 9PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 72PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 1PT">
	A is the number of issued and outstanding Almaden Common Shares at that time (i.e., for greater certainty, excluding all Dissent Shares) multiplied by 0.6, and
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 9PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 72PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 1PT">
	B is the aggregate of all amounts each of which is a Fractional Share Amount in respect of an Almaden Shareholder (but, for greater certainty, excluding a Fractional Share Amount in respect of a Dissent Share),
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 9PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 36PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 1PT">
	such that following the Subdivision, the number of issued and outstanding Spinco Common Shares shall be equal to the aggregate number of Spinco Common Shares distributable to the Almaden Shareholders on the Share Exchange having regard to the Round Down Provision;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 9.2PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="A8905821AC174B3DBEC07E60EC771016" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33.7PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(d)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	Each holder of an Almaden Stock Option will dispose of and be deemed to dispose of the Almaden Stock Option and in consideration therefor will concurrently receive
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.3PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 9PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="0FEF707594BF47119ADAD3FECD7EC098" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 34.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(i)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	one Almaden Replacement Stock Option having an exercise price equal to the product obtained by multiplying: (A) the exercise price of the Almaden Stock Option by (B) the quotient obtained by dividing the 5 Day VWAP of an Almaden Class B Common Share for the period beginning immediately after the conclusion of the Arrangement steps by the aggregate of the 5 Day VWAP of an Almaden Class B Common Share and the product of .6 multiplied by the 5 Day VWAP of a Spinco Common Share for that period, rounded to the nearest whole cent and subject to adjustment as set out below, and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.3PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 9PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="9ECD010462B5461BB54BC77DE8A4AAAF" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 34.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(ii)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	one Spinco Replacement Stock Option having an exercise price equal to the product obtained by multiplying: (A) the quotient obtained by dividing the exercise price of the Almaden Stock Option by .6; by (B) the quotient obtained by dividing the product of .6 multiplied by the 5 Day VWAP of a Spinco Common Share for the period beginning immediately after the conclusion of the Arrangement steps by the aggregate of the 5 Day VWAP of an Almaden Class B Common Share and the product of .6 multiplied by the 5 Day VWAP of a Spinco Common Share for that period, rounded to the nearest whole cent and subject to adjustment as set out below,
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.3PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10.45PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 36PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 1PT">
	and nothing more and all Almaden Stock Options will thereupon be cancelled (each such disposition, receipt, and cancellation, collectively, an
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Option Exchange"),
</FONT>
	provided that the exercise prices of each Almaden Replacement Stock Option and each Spinco Replacement Stock Option issued pursuant to an Option Exchange shall be and be deemed to be automatically adjusted such that the aggregate In the Money Amounts thereof immediately after the Option Exchange does not exceed the In the Money Amount of the exchanged Almaden Stock Option determined immediately before the Option Exchange, with the intention that that subsection 7(1.4) of the
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
	Income Tax Act
</FONT>
	(Canada) will apply to each Option Exchange;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 10PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH" ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER" ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: NORMAL; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL" ID="DSPFPAGENUMBER">
	A-5
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS" ID="DSPFPAGEBREAK">
<HR STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0PX; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000; MARGIN: 4PX 0PX; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0PX; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0PX; HEIGHT: 2PX; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: BOTH; BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0PX" NOSHADE="NOSHADE">
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage147"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 9.5PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 11.1PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="0E131D9E06D74A1CBAC0FFBEB949B8FC" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(e)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	Each Almaden Warrant will be and be deemed to be exchanged for
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 9.2PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="53637076CE8E44F79F6A82BE46A76DBF" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.9PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(i)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	one Almaden Replacement Warrant having an exercise price equal to the product obtained by multiplying: (A) the exercise price of the Almaden Warrant; by (B) by the quotient obtained by dividing the 5 Day VWAP of an Almaden Class B Common Share for the period beginning immediately after the conclusion of the Arrangement steps by the aggregate of the 5 Day VWAP of an Almaden Class B Common Share and the product of .6 multiplied by the 5 Day VWAP of a Spinco Common Share for that period, rounded to the nearest whole cent, and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.3PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 8.65PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="30EF72C4B0D24086AFB364E2F64B7600" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.9PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(ii)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	one Spinco Replacement Warrant having an exercise price equal to the product obtained by multiplying: (A) the quotient obtained by dividing the exercise price of the Almaden Warrant by .6; by (B) the quotient obtained by dividing the product of .6 multiplied by the 5 Day VWAP of a Spinco Common Share for the period beginning immediately after the conclusion of the Arrangement steps by the aggregate of the 5 Day VWAP of an Almaden Class B Common Share and the product of .6 multiplied by the 5 Day VWAP of a Spinco Common Share for that period, rounded to the nearest whole cent,
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.75PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 9.2PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 36PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 1PT">
	(each such exchange, a
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Warrant Exchange"),
</FONT>
	and the Almaden Warrants will thereupon be cancelled;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10.6PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="741759660D5040B5AF02C58380270B22" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(f)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	Each Almaden Shareholder shall dispose of all of his, her or its Almaden Common Shares held to Almaden and in consideration therefor Almaden will issue or distribute to the Almaden Shareholder
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 9.5PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 11.35PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="D8E5A0489CA34423A10BD35C81DA72BB" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.9PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(i)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	the same number of Almaden Class B Common Shares, and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10.6PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="9A0155A06E444B2F94CADFC67078B2A1" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.9PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(ii)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
	that number of Spinco Common Shares equal to the product of the number of Almaden Common Shares held and 0.6, less the Fractional Share Amount, if any, in respect of that Almaden Shareholder (the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Share Exchange"),
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 9.5PT; TEXT-INDENT: -36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 11.1PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 72PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
	and, in respect thereof,
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 8.8PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="CE9AAA1D89B24EB691E93E4D499E03F9" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.9PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(iii)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	the name of each Almaden Shareholder shall be removed from the central securities register for the Almaden Common Shares and added to the central securities register for the Almaden Class B Common Shares and the Spinco Common Shares as the holder of the number of Almaden Class B Common Shares and Spinco Common Shares, respectively, received pursuant to the Share Exchange,
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.75PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 9.2PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="543EBDC00F384DAC90AD4EC38ED86B76" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.9PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(iv)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	the Almaden Common Shares shall be cancelled and the capital in respect of such shares shall be reduced to nil, and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="9B7B77170DA540A09BA3194CD559671F" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.9PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(v)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	an amount equal to the capital of the Almaden Common Shares immediately before the Share Exchange less the aggregate fair market value of the Spinco Common Shares distributed on the Share Exchange shall be added to the capital in respect of the Almaden Class B Common Shares issued on the Share Exchange; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 10PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH" ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER" ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: NORMAL; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL" ID="DSPFPAGENUMBER">
	A-6
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS" ID="DSPFPAGEBREAK">
<HR STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0PX; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000; MARGIN: 4PX 0PX; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0PX; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0PX; HEIGHT: 2PX; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: BOTH; BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0PX" NOSHADE="NOSHADE">
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage148"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 9.5PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 11.15PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="626CB45E754445F1B335302CBFB9F2BC" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 37PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 34.4PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(g)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	The authorized share structure of Almaden shall be reorganized and altered by
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.75PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12.2PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="5CFF273885424A279D1B50218D217738" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 73PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 34.2PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(i)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	eliminating the Almaden Common Shares from the authorized share structure of Almaden; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 13.6PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="0C89B7474BE849638E3629746EA499DE" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 73PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 34.2PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(ii)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	changing the identifying name of the issued and unissued Almaden Class B Common Shares from "Class B Common shares" to "Common shares".
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 9.5PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 11.1PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'COURIER NEW', MONOSPACE; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	2.3
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
<U>
	No Fractional Shares
</U>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 13.6PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2PT">
	No fractional Spinco Common Shares shall be distributed by Almaden to an Almaden Shareholder on the Share Exchange. To the extent that Almaden would otherwise be required to distribute to an Almaden Shareholder on the Share Exchange an aggregate number of Spinco Common Shares that is not a round number, the number of Spinco Common Shares so distributed to the Almaden Shareholder shall be rounded down to the next lesser whole number of Spinco Common Shares (the
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Round Down Provision")
</FONT>
	and the Almaden Shareholder shall not receive any compensation in respect thereof.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 9.5PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 11.35PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'COURIER NEW', MONOSPACE; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	2.4
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
<U>
	Completion Time Procedures
</U>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2PT">
	On or immediately prior to the Effective Date, Almaden shall deliver or arrange to be delivered to Computershare certificates representing the Spinco Common Shares required hereunder, which certificates shall be distributed to Almaden Shareholders in accordance with Article 4 hereof.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 13.6PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	ARTICLE 3
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 13.6PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	DISSENT RIGHTS
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 9.5PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 11.1PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'COURIER NEW', MONOSPACE; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	3.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="WIDTH: 34.25PT; DISPLAY: INLINE-BLOCK; FONT-SIZE: 1PX" ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB">
	&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
<U>
	Dissent Rights of Almaden Shareholders
</U>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="35EBDC8F5AFF45A38EC198C81E075CA3" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR STYLE="HEIGHT: 19PX">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 37PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 34.4PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(1)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
	Each registered Almaden Shareholder may exercise dissent rights
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	("Dissent Rights")
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
	in
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12.2PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2PT">
	connection with the Arrangement with respect to the Almaden Shareholder's Almaden Common Shares pursuant to and in the manner set forth in the Interim Order, paragraph 238(l)(d) of the
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
	Business Corporations Act
</FONT>
	(British Columbia) and this Article, as the same may be modified by the Interim Order or the Final Order. Registered Almaden Shareholders who duly exercise such Dissent Rights and who:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.3PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="00BDF2FD736044ED9D69C6F9900F93AD" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 37PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 34.4PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
	are ultimately entitled to be paid fair value for their Dissent Shares shall be deemed not
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
	to
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.3PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 11.8PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 73PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2PT">
	have participated in the Share Exchange and such Dissent Shares shall be deemed to have been repurchased by Almaden for cancellation at the Effective Time in consideration for a debt-claim against Almaden to be paid the fair value of such Dissent Shares, which fair value shall be determined as of the close of business on the Business Day before the day on which the Final Order is made, and will not be entitled to any other payment or consideration, and the name of each such Dissenting Shareholder will thereupon be removed from the register of holders of Almaden Common Shares; or
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="7C89A00E90B349D4842CEFF779CB6C8D" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 37PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 34.4PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	are ultimately not entitled, for any reason, to be paid fair value for their Almaden Common Shares shall be deemed to have participated in the Plan of Arrangement on the same basis as any non-dissenting Almaden Shareholder as at and from the Effective Time and will be treated in the same manner as such a holder, on the basis set out in this Plan of Arrangement.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="F2AADA8DA2C64FD0A702E43670ABB368" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 37PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 34.4PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(2)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
	The aggregate of all amount paid to Almaden Shareholders by Almaden in respect
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
	of Dissent Shares in accordance with Subsection 3.1(l)(a) shall be deducted from the stated capital account maintained by Almaden for the Almaden Common Shares.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 10PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH" ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER" ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: NORMAL; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL" ID="DSPFPAGENUMBER">
	A-7
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS" ID="DSPFPAGEBREAK">
<HR STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0PX; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000; MARGIN: 4PX 0PX; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0PX; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0PX; HEIGHT: 2PX; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: BOTH; BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0PX" NOSHADE="NOSHADE">
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage149"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 8.8PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 1PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
	(3)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="WIDTH: 32.9PT; DISPLAY: INLINE-BLOCK; FONT-SIZE: 1PX" ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB">
	&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
	The amount of any deemed dividend resulting from application of subsection 84(3) of the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
	Income Tax Act
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
	(Canada) to the repurchase of Dissent Shares held by Dissenting Shareholders is hereby designated by Almaden as an Eligible Dividend.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.75PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10.8PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 1PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
	(4)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="WIDTH: 32.9PT; DISPLAY: INLINE-BLOCK; FONT-SIZE: 1PX" ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB">
	&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
	All payments made to a Dissenting Shareholder pursuant to this Article shall be subject to, and paid net of, all applicable withholding taxes.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 9.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10.85PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'COURIER NEW', MONOSPACE; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	3.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="WIDTH: 9PT; DISPLAY: INLINE-BLOCK; FONT-SIZE: 1PX" ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
<U>
	General - Dissent Rights
</U>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 8.8PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 1PT">
	For greater certainty, in addition to any other restrictions in section 238 of the
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
	Business Corporations Act
</FONT>
	(British Columbia), no person who has voted in favour of this Plan of Arrangement shall be entitled to dissent with respect to the Plan of Arrangement.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 8.8PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 1PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.75PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10.8PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	ARTICLE 4
<BR>
	DELIVERY OF SECURITIES
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 9.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10.85PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'COURIER NEW', MONOSPACE; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'">
	4.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="WIDTH: 9PT; DISPLAY: INLINE-BLOCK; FONT-SIZE: 1PX" ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
<U>
	Delivery of Securities
</U>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 9PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 1PT">
	Upon completion of the Plan of Arrangement, Almaden shall deliver to each Almaden Shareholder a certificate representing the Spinco Common Shares to which such holder is entitled to receive hereunder.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 9PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 1PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10.6PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	ARTICLE 5
<BR>
	AMENDMENTS
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 9.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 11.1PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'COURIER NEW', MONOSPACE; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'">
	5.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="WIDTH: 9PT; DISPLAY: INLINE-BLOCK; FONT-SIZE: 1PX" ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
<U>
	Amendments
</U>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10.6PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 1PT">
	Almaden, in its sole discretion, reserves the right to amend, modify and/or supplement this Plan of Arrangement from time to time at any time prior to the Effective Time provided that any such amendment, modification or supplement must be contained in a written document that is filed with the Court and, if made following the Meeting, approved by the Court.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 9.5PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10.85PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	5.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="WIDTH: 9PT; DISPLAY: INLINE-BLOCK; FONT-SIZE: 1PX; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL" ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
<U>
	Effectiveness of Amendments Made Prior to or at the Meeting
</U>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10.6PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 1PT">
	Any amendment, modification or supplement to this Plan of Arrangement may be proposed by Almaden at any time prior to or at the Meeting with or without any prior notice or communication, and if so proposed and accepted by the Almaden Shareholders voting at the Meeting, shall become part of this Plan of Arrangement for all purposes.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 9.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 11.1PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'COURIER NEW', MONOSPACE; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	5.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="WIDTH: 9PT; DISPLAY: INLINE-BLOCK; FONT-SIZE: 1PX; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL" ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
<U>
	Effectiveness of Amendments Made Following the Meeting
</U>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 1PT">
	Any amendment, modification or supplement to this Plan of Arrangement may be proposed by Almaden after the
<FONT STYLE="WIDTH: 12PT; DISPLAY: INLINE-BLOCK; FONT-SIZE: 1PX" ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB">
	&#160;
</FONT>
	Meeting but prior to the Effective Time and any such amendment,
<FONT STYLE="WIDTH: 12PT; DISPLAY: INLINE-BLOCK; FONT-SIZE: 1PX" ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB">
	&#160;
</FONT>
	modification
<FONT STYLE="WIDTH: 12PT; DISPLAY: INLINE-BLOCK; FONT-SIZE: 1PX" ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB">
	&#160;
</FONT>
	or
<FONT STYLE="WIDTH: 12PT; DISPLAY: INLINE-BLOCK; FONT-SIZE: 1PX" ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB">
	&#160;
</FONT>
	supplement
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
	whichis
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
	approved by the Court following the Meeting shall be effective and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9.5PT">
	shall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="WIDTH: 1.15PT; DISPLAY: INLINE-BLOCK; FONT-SIZE: 1PX" ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB">
	&#160;
</FONT>
	become part of the Plan
</FONT>
	of Arrangement for all purposes.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.5PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
</DIV>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	THIS ADMINISTRATIVE SERVICES AGREEMENT
</FONT>
	made effective as of the 15
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TEXT-TOP; LINE-HEIGHT: 1; FONT-SIZE: SMALLER">
	th
</SUP>
	&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#160;
</FONT>
	day of May, 2015.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 5.75PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	BETWEEN:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 77.75PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 74.9PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	ALMADEN MINERALS LTD.
</FONT>
	, a company incorporated under the laws of the Province of British Columbia with an office at Suite 1103, 750 West Pender Street, Vancouver, British Columbia, V6C&#160;2T8 ("
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Manager
</FONT>
	")
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	- and -
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 77.75PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 74.9PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	ALMADEX MINERALS LIMITED
</FONT>
	, a company incorporated under the laws of the Province of British Columbia with an office at Suite 1103, 750 West Pender Street, Vancouver, British Columbia, V6C&#160;2T8 ("
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Managed Entity
</FONT>
	")
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	WHEREAS
</FONT>
	the Managed Entity requires office space, furnishings and equipment, communications facilities, accounting services, marketing services, secretarial services, and the administrative services and personnel necessary to fulfil the basic day-to-day responsibilities imposed on the Managed Entity, to carry out and ensure compliance with the requirements of a reporting issuer, and to generally carry on its business, and has no permanent staff to perform these duties;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	AND WHEREAS
</FONT>
	Manager has the necessary space, equipment, personnel and expertise to provide all of the services and facilities required by the Managed Entity and the Managed Entity wishes to engage Manager to provide such services and facilities;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	NOW THEREFORE, THIS AGREEMENT WITNESSETH
</FONT>
	that in consideration of the covenants herein contained and such other good and valuable consideration (the receipt and sufficiency of which is hereby acknowledged by the Parties), the Parties hereby agree as follows:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #010000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	ARTICLE 1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<BR>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	INTERPRETATION
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #010000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="WIDTH: 12PT; DISPLAY: INLINE-BLOCK; FONT-SIZE: 1PX" ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB">
	&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<U>
	Definitions
</U>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	In this Agreement, the following terms will have the meanings set out below unless the context otherwise requires:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 28.1PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2.9PT">
	"
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Affiliate
</FONT>
	" of a person (the "
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Subject Person
</FONT>
	") means any other person that directly or indirectly controls, is controlled by or is under common control with the Subject Person. For purposes of this definition, "
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	control
</FONT>
	" of a person means (i) ownership of more than 50% of the issued shares or other equity interests of such person or (ii) the power to direct the management or policies of a person, whether through the ownership of more than 50% of the voting power of such person, through the power to appoint more than half of the members of the board of directors or similar governing body of such person, or through contractual or other arrangements;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 10PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH" ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA">
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS" ID="DSPFPAGEBREAK">
<HR STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0PX; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000; MARGIN: 4PX 0PX; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0PX; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0PX; HEIGHT: 2PX; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: BOTH; BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0PX" NOSHADE="NOSHADE">
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage154"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 28.1PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2.9PT">
	"
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Annual Budget
</FONT>
	" means, in respect of any Fiscal Year, an annual budget estimating the costs, on a monthly basis, of providing the Services and access to, and use of the Personnel and assets contained in, the Shared Facilities, such budget to include a reasonable description of the method and basis for determining the costs to be allocated;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 28.1PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2.9PT">
	"
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Applicable Law
</FONT>
	" means, with respect to any person, property, transaction, event or other matter, any law, rule, statute, regulation, order, judgment, decree, treaty or other requirement having the force of law (collectively the "
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Law
</FONT>
	") relating or applicable to such person, property, transaction, event or other matter.&#160; Applicable Law also includes, where appropriate, any interpretation of the Law (or any part) by any person having jurisdiction over it, or charged with its administration or interpretation;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 28.1PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2.9PT">
	"
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Confidential Information
</FONT>
	" means the confidential, secret or proprietary information of one Party or any of its Affiliates (the "
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Disclosing Party
</FONT>
	"), including data, technical information, financial information including prices, business information including business plans, strategies and practices, information relating to customers and prospective customers, trade secrets, know-how, methods, procedures, reports, budgets, computer tapes and other storage media, technology, files, documentation, and software of the Disclosing Party which has been or may hereafter be disclosed, directly or indirectly, to any other Party (the "
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Receiving Party
</FONT>
	") either orally, in writing, electronically or in any other material form or medium pursuant to and in conjunction with this Agreement, and includes all information relating to any arbitration proceeding under Section 11.11;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 28.1PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2.9PT">
	"
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Disclosing Party
</FONT>
	" has the meaning ascribed thereto in the definition of "Confidential Information" set out herein;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 28.1PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2.9PT">
	"
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Documentation
</FONT>
	" has the meaning ascribed thereto in Section 7.1;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 28.1PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2.9PT">
	"
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Exchange
</FONT>
	" means the TSX Venture Exchange and any other stock exchange which lists the Managed Entity's Securities as applicable;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 28.1PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2.9PT">
	"
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Fiscal Year
</FONT>
	" means a twelve month period proposed by the Manager and agreed to by the Managed Entity, acting reasonably;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 28.1PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2.9PT">
	"
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Force Majeure Event
</FONT>
	" has the meaning ascribed thereto in Section 10.1;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 28.1PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2.9PT">
	"
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	G&amp;A Overhead Charge
</FONT>
	" has the meaning ascribed thereto in Section 4.1;

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 28.1PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 2.9PT">
	"

</TD>

</FONT>

</FONT>
