<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #010000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	9.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="WIDTH: 12PT; DISPLAY: INLINE-BLOCK; FONT-SIZE: 1PX" ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB">
	&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<U>
	Injunctive Relief
</U>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Each Receiving Party recognizes that its unauthorized disclosure of Confidential Information of a Disclosing Party may give rise to irreparable injury to the Disclosing Party and acknowledges that remedies other than injunctive relief may not be adequate.&#160; Accordingly, each Party has the right to seek equitable and injunctive relief on an interim and interlocutory basis in any court of competent jurisdiction to prevent the unauthorized possession, use, or disclosure or knowledge of any Confidential Information of that Party, as well as to such damages or other relief as is occasioned by such unauthorized possession, use, disclosure or knowledge.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 10PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH" ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER" ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA">

	- 18 -
</FONT>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #010000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	9.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="WIDTH: 12PT; DISPLAY: INLINE-BLOCK; FONT-SIZE: 1PX" ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB">
	&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<U>
	Return of Confidential Information
</U>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Each Party shall:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="0A53504C647547D79906939E58E0796C" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
</TD>

	(a)
</TD>

	at the request of the Disclosing Party at any time;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="158DBECC9045495E8D4F4674A7217DF8" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">

	(b)
</TD>

	after the Receiving Party's need for it has expired; or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="8DDDE1E93EFD481986F155CE21642AF9" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
</TD>

	(c)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	in connection with the termination of this Agreement, whether in whole or in part, promptly return to the Disclosing Party, or use all commercially reasonable efforts to erase and destroy, all of the Confidential Information of the Disclosing Party in possession or control or such portion of it as has been requested by the Disclosing Party; provided that the Receiving Party shall only be required to use reasonable efforts to return or destroy any Confidential Information stored electronically, and the Receiving Party shall not be required to return or destroy any electronic copy of Confidential Information created pursuant to its standard electronic backup and archival procedures, provided further that: (i) personnel whose functions are not primarily information technology in nature do not access such retained copies; and (ii) personnel whose functions are primarily information technology in nature access such copies only as reasonably necessary for the performance of their information technology duties (
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	e.g.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	, for purposes of system recovery).&#160; Notwithstanding the foregoing provisions of this Section 9.3(c), the Receiving Party may retain: (x) a list of all Confidential Information so as to be able to identify the nature of the Confidential Information that the Receiving Party has returned or destroyed; provided, however, that a copy of such list is provided to the Disclosing Party contemporaneously with the return or destruction of such Confidential Information; and (y) any Confidential Information referred to in minutes of a meeting of the Receiving Party's board of directors or a committee thereof.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #010000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	9.4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="WIDTH: 12PT; DISPLAY: INLINE-BLOCK; FONT-SIZE: 1PX" ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB">
	&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<U>
	Non-Solicitation
</U>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Except with the prior written permission of the Manager, neither the Managed Entity, nor any of its representatives, will solicit or cause to be solicited, for employment or consulting engagement with the Managed Entity or its affiliates, any employee of the Manger or any person who performs functions on behalf of the Manager that are similar to those ordinarily performed by employees. For the purposes of this section, solicitation shall not include solicitation of employees where such solicitation is solely through advertising in periodicals of general circulation, the internet or an employee search firm on behalf of a party or its representatives, so long as the party or its representative did not direct or encourage such search firm to solicit a specifically named employee of the Manager.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 10PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH" ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER" ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: NORMAL; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL" ID="DSPFPAGENUMBER">
	- 19 -
</FONT>
</DIV>

</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage172"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #010000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	9.5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="WIDTH: 12PT; DISPLAY: INLINE-BLOCK; FONT-SIZE: 1PX" ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB">
	&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<U>
	Survival
</U>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	This Article 9 shall survive the termination or expiry of this Agreement for a period of two years from the date of such termination or expiry.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #010000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	ARTICLE 10
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<BR>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	FORCE MAJEURE
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #010000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	10.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="WIDTH: 12PT; DISPLAY: INLINE-BLOCK; FONT-SIZE: 1PX" ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB">
	&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<U>
	Force Majeure
</U>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="0B6B16E98137458CBEB3E5B593C9C9FF" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #010000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Neither Party shall be liable for a failure or delay in the performance of its obligations pursuant to this Agreement, provided that such failure or delay is caused, directly or indirectly, by fire, flood, earthquake, elements of nature or acts of God, acts of war, terrorism, riots, civil disorders, rebellions or revolutions, or strikes, lock outs or labour disruptions, acts of any Governmental Authorities having jurisdiction, the issuance or promulgation of any Applicable Law, inability to obtain or delays by a Governmental Authority in granting or issuing any necessary license, permit or authorization, actions or interference by local communities, aboriginal peoples or non-governmental organizations, interruptions or shortages of labour, transportation, fuel, electricity, materials, machinery, equipment or parts, or any other causes beyond the reasonable control of such Party, whether or not similar to the foregoing list of causes (each, a "
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Force Majeure Event
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	"). Lack of funds or finances shall not be a Force Majeure Event. Upon the occurrence of a Force Majeure Event, the affected Party shall promptly deliver notice to the other Party of the Force Majeure Event, particulars of the suspension of performance and the expected duration thereof. Thereafter, the affected Party shall, except as set out in Section 10.1(c), be excused from any further performance of those of its obligations pursuant to this Agreement affected by the Force Majeure Event only for so long as:
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="D7D53F40460E4EE4841FC27B4FCE97D9" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #010000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(i)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	such Force Majeure Event continues and for so long thereafter as such Party may reasonably require to alleviate the effect of the Force Majeure Event;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="B83C577A846E42EA939B74DE5C9FEF13" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #010000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(ii)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	the affected Party continues to use commercially reasonable efforts to recommence performance whenever and to whatever extent possible without delay; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="0EEE6983D4EF4CA9A2839E1264169154" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #010000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(iii)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	the affected Party provides written updates to the other Party at reasonable intervals as to the status of the Force Majeure Event, efforts to alleviate the effect of the Force Majeure Event, efforts to recommence performance and the expected duration of the Force Majeure Event.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="5384A883CB6E4B20B374AD600C7BC225" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #010000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	If a Force Majeure Event prevents, or in all likelihood will prevent, Manager from providing all or part of a Service, the Managed Entity may at its option, procure any affected Service or portion thereof from alternate sources until Manager is again able to provide such Service.&#160; Manager shall not be required to compensate the Managed Entity for any costs and expenses relating to the services obtained from such alternate sources.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>

	(c)
</TD>

	Upon the occurrence of a Force Majeure Event, Managed Entity shall not be excused from its obligation to pay the fee for the services; provided, however, that if Section 10.1(b) is applicable, the Parties agree that the fees payable hereunder shall be equitably reduced to reflect Services not received by the Managed Entity from Manager during the duration of the Force Majeure Event.
</TD>

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #010000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	11.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="WIDTH: 12PT; DISPLAY: INLINE-BLOCK; FONT-SIZE: 1PX" ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB">
	&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<U>
	Exchange Acceptance
</U>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	This Agreement may be subject to the acceptance for filing thereof by the Exchange on which the Managed Entity's shares are listed for trading. If this Agreement is not accepted for filing by the Exchange, the Parties will forthwith negotiate such amendments to this Agreement as may be necessary to secure such acceptance for filing.&#160;&#160; If such amendments cannot be mutually agreed upon, then either party may, by notice to the other, terminate this Agreement, provided that in such case all amounts owing for Services pursuant to Section 2.1 incurred prior to the date of such termination will be a debt of the Managed Entity owing to Manager and due and payable forthwith.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">

	A Party shall, upon request of the other Party, execute and deliver or cause to be executed and delivered all such documents, deeds and other instruments of further assurance and do or cause to be done all such acts and things as may be reasonably necessary or advisable to implement and give full effect to the provisions of this Agreement.
</DIV>

</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Notwithstanding the date or dates upon which this Agreement is executed by either Party, this Agreement shall be in full force and effect between the Parties effective as of and from the date first above written.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #010000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	11.11
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="WIDTH: 12PT; DISPLAY: INLINE-BLOCK; FONT-SIZE: 1PX" ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB">
	&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<U>
	Arbitration
</U>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	All disputes arising out of or in connection with this Agreement or in respect of any legal relationship associated therewith or derived therefrom shall be referred to and finally resolved by arbitration administered by the International Centre for Dispute Resolution (the "
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	ICDR
</FONT>
	") under its International Arbitration Rules (the "
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Rules
</FONT>
	"). Upon referral of a dispute to arbitration, the Parties will endeavor to agree on the appointment of a sole arbitrator, failing which the arbitrator will be appointed in accordance with the ICDR Rules. The place of the arbitration shall be Vancouver, British Columbia. The language of the arbitration shall be English.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 10PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH" ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER" ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: NORMAL; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL" ID="DSPFPAGENUMBER">
	- 23 -
</FONT>
</DIV>

	NOW THEREFORE
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	in consideration of the premises and the mutual covenants and agreements set forth herein, and of other good and valuable consideration
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	the receipt and sufficiency of which are hereby expressly acknowledged by each of the Parties, the Parties hereby agree that the ASA is hereby amended as follows:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.55PT; COLOR: #000000">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 77.5PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1.&#160; &#160; &#160; &#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The following is added immediately after Subsection 6.2(d) o
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	f
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	the ASA:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 13PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.95PT; COLOR: #000000">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 13PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.65PT; TEXT-INDENT: -34.3PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; MARGIN-LEFT: 54.75PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 4.15PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	"
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(e)&#160; &#160; &#160; The Parties acknowledge that the terms of Subsection 6.2(a) were agreed to by the Parties on the basis of the pre-existing and on-going relationship of the Parties such that it was mutuall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	y
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	understood that no notice of termination would be given by either Party without advance planning on the part of both Parties to permit an orderly transition and minimize business disruption following the giving of such notice
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	If
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	however
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	either Party is subject to a Change of Control during the term of this Agreement (such Party referred to in this Subsection
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	2(e) as the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	"
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Target
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	"
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	) there will not be adequate time for such advance plann
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	i
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	ng and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	notwithstanding anything to the contrary contained in this Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	the Parties agree that upon a Change of Control the Manager's engagement hereunder shall, unless otherwise agreed to in writing by both
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="COLOR: #000000" ID="DSPFPAGEFOOTER">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="COLOR: #000000" ID="DSPFPAGEHEADER">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 0PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #000000">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 10PT; COLOR: #000000">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 10PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 10PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH" ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA">
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS; COLOR: #000000" ID="DSPFPAGEBREAK">
<HR STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0PX; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000; MARGIN: 4PX 0PX; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0PX; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0PX; HEIGHT: 2PX; CLEAR: BOTH; BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0PX" NOSHADE="NOSHADE">
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage180"></A>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; COLOR: #000000" ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA">
	- 2 -
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 10PT; COLOR: #000000">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 10PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0.25PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; MARGIN-LEFT: 53.1PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 3.85PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Parties, automatically terminate 48 hours after the Change of Control with immediate effect and the Target shall forthwith upon such termination pay to the other Party $2 million as compensation for the unplanned termination of the Manager's engagement hereunder and the significant disruption to the business of the other Party as a result of such unplanned termination, such amount being a genuine pre-estimate by the Parties of the loss such other Party will suffer as a consequence thereof. For purposes of this Agreement,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Change of Control"
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	means the date upon which, without the Target's written concurrence therewith, any person (as that term is defined in the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Securities Act
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(British Columbia)) makes and does not withdraw a take over bid (as that term is defined in the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	e
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	curities Act
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(British Columbia)) or acquires, directly or indirectly, that number of common shares of the Target which equals or exceeds twenty percent (20%) of the then issued common shares of the Target.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	"
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 13PT; COLOR: #000000">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 13PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	2. Except as amended by this First Amending Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	all terms and conditions of the
</FONT>
	ASA shall remain unchanged and continue to be in full force and effect.
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	3. This First Amending Agreement may be executed in one or more counterparts and may be delivered by facsimile or other means of electronic transmission, all of which shall be deemed to constitute one and the same original instrument.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="DSPFPAGEHEADER">

	,&#160;

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	notwithstanding section 1 of this Agreement, as a condition of this Agreement, all information acquired&#160; by the Management Company relating to or connected with the business or corporate affairs&#160; of the Corporation shall continue to be kept in strict confidence and shall not be disclosed to anyone other than the Board of Directors of the Corporation, other executive officers of the Corporation or the Corporation's professional advisors, unless required pursuant to the securities&#160; legislation governing the Corporation or otherwise by law.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 13PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.5PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 13PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.5PT; COLOR: #000000">
	3.&#160; &#160; &#160; &#160; &#160; &#160; &#160;&#160; The parties will execute all such further agreements,&#160; instructions and documents and do all such further acts and things as may reasonably be required to give effect to and carry out the full intent of this Agreement.

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 13PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.35PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 13PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.2PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 13PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.2PT; COLOR: #000000">
	5.&#160; &#160; &#160; &#160; &#160; &#160; &#160;&#160; This Agreement may be executed in one or more counterparts, each of which shall be deemed an original, but all of which together shall constitute one and the same instrument.

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 13PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.2PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 13PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.2PT; COLOR: #000000">

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.05PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">

</A>
	Exhibit 4.9
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 14PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.05PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 14PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="C3ADE6A431C84990806EF96FE3D11BD1" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 34.74%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 0PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT; MARGIN-TOP: 3.7PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; MARGIN-LEFT: 2.5PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	EXECUTIVE&#160;&#160; EMPLOYMENT CONTRACT (the "Agreement") dated&#160; effective as of January 1, 2016 (the "Effective Date")
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 9PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.35PT; COLOR: #000000">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 9PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 10PT; COLOR: #000000">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 10PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.4PT; MARGIN-TOP: 1.6PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; MARGIN-LEFT: 8.55PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	BETWEEN
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 9.5PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.5PT; COLOR: #000000">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 9.5PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.4PT; MARGIN-TOP: 1.6PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; MARGIN-LEFT: 84.15PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	ALMADEN MINERALS
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	LTD.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	a British Columbia company
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT; MARGIN-TOP: 1.6PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	hereinafter the "Corporation"
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; MARGIN-LEFT: 7.35PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	AND:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 9.5PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.5PT; COLOR: #000000">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 9.5PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.4PT; MARGIN-TOP: 1.6PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; MARGIN-LEFT: 84.15PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	DUANE POLIQUIN
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT; MARGIN-TOP: 1.6PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	hereinafter the "Executive"&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 14.4PT">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 10PT; COLOR: #000000">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	WHEREAS
</FONT>
	the Corporation is a mineral exploration and development company;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 10PT; COLOR: #000000">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 7.5PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.35PT; COLOR: #000000">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 7.5PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 10PT; COLOR: #000000">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	AND WHEREAS,
</FONT>
	pursuant to the terms of an Executive Compensation Contract dated effective as of January 29, 2013 between the Corporation and Hawk Mountain Resources Ltd. ("Hawk Mountain"), Hawk Mountain provided the services of the Executive to the Corporation;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 6.5PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.4PT; COLOR: #000000">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 6.5PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.4PT; COLOR: #000000">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 6.5PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 10PT; COLOR: #000000">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	AND
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	WHEREAS&#160;
</FONT>
	the Corporation and Hawk Mountain have mutually agreed to terminate the Executive Compensation Contract effective December 31, 2015;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 10PT; COLOR: #000000">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 7.5PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.25PT; COLOR: #000000">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 7.5PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 10PT; COLOR: #000000">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	AND WHEREAS
</FONT>
	the Corporation has agreed to employ the Executive, and the Executive has agreed to be employed by the Corporation, on the terms set forth in this Agreement, as the Executive Chairman of the Board of the Corporation;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 10PT; COLOR: #000000">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 7.5PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.05PT; COLOR: #000000">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 7.5PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 10PT; COLOR: #000000">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	AND WHEREAS
</FONT>
	the Corporation recognizes the valuable services that the Executive has provided to it through Hawk Mountain and is anticipated to continue to provide to it and its subsidiaries pursuant to the terms of this Agreement and believes that it is reasonable and fair to the Corporation that the Executive receive fair treatment in the event of a Change in Control (as hereinafter defined) and the directors of the Corporation have determined that it is in the best interests of the Corporation to induce the Executive to become employed by and to remain in the employ of the Corporation and its subsidiaries by indicating that in the event of a Change in Control the Executive would have certain guaranteed rights.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 10PT; COLOR: #000000">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 8.5PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.05PT; COLOR: #000000">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 8.5PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	NOW THEREFORE, THE PARTIES HERETO AGREE AS FOLLOWS:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.55PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.55PT; COLOR: #000000; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	1.&#160; &#160; &#160;&#160; Term
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.6PT; COLOR: #000000">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.55PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; MARGIN-LEFT: 43.35PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 4.85PT">
	The term of this Agreement (the "Term") shall be for 2 years commencing the Effective Date.&#160;&#160; The Term of this Agreement shall expire at the end of the day which is the last day of the Term unless earlier terminated in accordance with the provisions of this Agreement.
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="COLOR: #000000" ID="DSPFPAGEFOOTER">
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEHEADER">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 10PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH" ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA">
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS" ID="DSPFPAGEBREAK">
<HR STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0PX; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000; MARGIN: 4PX 0PX; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0PX; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0PX; HEIGHT: 2PX; CLEAR: BOTH; BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0PX" NOSHADE="NOSHADE">
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage184"></A>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER" ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: NORMAL; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL" ID="DSPFPAGENUMBER">
	2
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 9.8PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #000000; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	.&#160; &#160; &#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Renewal
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.35PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.6PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; MARGIN-LEFT: 42.4PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 3.6PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The Term of this Agreement shall be extended for two additional successive terms of 24 months each&#160; (each 24 month period being referred to as an "Extended Term
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	"
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	unless written notice to terminate this Agreement is given by either party
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; MARGIN-LEFT: 42.9PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 4.45PT">
	90 days prior to the expiration of the Term or an Extended Term or unless earlier
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.05PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; MARGIN-LEFT: 42.4PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 100.35PT">
	terminated in accordance with the provisions of this Agreement.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.65PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #000000; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	3.&#160; &#160; &#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Remuneration
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.55PT; COLOR: #000000">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; MARGIN-LEFT: 42.65PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 304.55PT">
	(a)&#160; &#160; &#160; Annual Salary
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.35PT; COLOR: #000000">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.6PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; MARGIN-LEFT: 41.2PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 4.2PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The Executive shall be entitled to receive from the Corporation remuneration in an amount of $240,000 per annum ("Base Salary") subject to all requisite withholdings and deductions as may be required under applicable law, but exclusive of any bonuses, benefits or other compensation. Payment shall be made in monthly or such other increments as may be agreed upon between the parties
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The Base Salary shall be subject to annual review and increase but not reduction and shall be increased as may be agreed upon between the Executive and the Corporation. The annual reviews shalJbe conducted in the month preceding each anniversary of the commencement of the Term or an Extended Term
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.8PT; COLOR: #000000">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; MARGIN-LEFT: 42.65PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 299.45PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(b)&#160; &#160; &#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

	,

	at the option of the Executive, be deferred in one year and utilized in a later year.

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	7.&#160; &#160; &#160;&#160; Termination
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 13PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.1PT; COLOR: #000000">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 13PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.5PT; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; MARGIN-LEFT: 41.9PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.2PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	This Agreement will terminate or may be term
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	i
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	nated for anyone&#160;&#160; of the following reasons:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.95PT; COLOR: #000000">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.5PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="4D47EF60BB96462D945F72F0FE067233" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 41.7PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 35.3PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	voluntary, upon at least three (3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	months prior written notice of termination by the Executive to the Corporation
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	or
</FONT>
</TD>

<HR STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0PX; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000; MARGIN: 4PX 0PX; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0PX; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0PX; HEIGHT: 2PX; CLEAR: BOTH; BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0PX" NOSHADE="NOSHADE">

	4
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 10PT; COLOR: #000000">

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.6PT; MARGIN-TOP: 1.6PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="DB25EDE40D614211ABD9DD055ED4FE68" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42.25PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 35.75PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	without Cause, as hereinafter defined in Section 9, upon at least three (3) months prior written notice of termination by the Corporation to the Executive; or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.55PT; COLOR: #000000">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; MARGIN-LEFT: 42PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 215.75PT">
	(c)&#160; &#160; &#160; by the Corporation for Cause; or
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.55PT; COLOR: #000000">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; MARGIN-LEFT: 42PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 3.8PT">
	(d)&#160; &#160; &#160; upon the death or disability of the Executive, as hereinafter defined in
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.05PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; MARGIN-LEFT: 78.7PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Section 10; or
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.55PT; COLOR: #000000">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; MARGIN-LEFT: 41.75PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 208.6PT">
	(e)&#160; &#160; &#160; upon retirement by the Executive.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 10PT; COLOR: #000000">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 10PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 14PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.3PT; COLOR: #000000; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	8.&#160; &#160; &#160;&#160; Termination by the Executive Voluntarily or by the Corporation for Cause
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.85PT; COLOR: #000000">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.6PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0.7PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; MARGIN-LEFT: 41.3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 4PT">
	If the Executive shall voluntarily terminate employment under this Agreement or if the employment of the Executive is terminated by the Corporation for Cause, then all compensation and benefits as theretofore provided shall terminate immediately upon the effective date of termination and no special severance compensation will be paid.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 8PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.3PT; COLOR: #000000">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 8PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 10PT; COLOR: #000000">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 10PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; MARGIN-LEFT: 41.3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 117.65PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Cause
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	to terminate the Executive's employment shall mean:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.55PT; COLOR: #000000">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.6PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="920B92CE3531417387247241094168DE" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 41.25PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 35.75PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	the repeated and demonstrated failure by the Executive to perform the Executive's material duties under this Agreement, after demand for substantial performance is delivered by the Corporation to the Executive that specifically identifies the manner in which the Corporation believes the Executive has not substantially performed the Executive's duties under this Agreement; or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.85PT; COLOR: #000000">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.5PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="1252956AEBAD49AF85EEEBF0A2389B03" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 41.3PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 35.7PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	the willful engagement by the Executive in misconduct which is materially injurious to the Corporation, monetarily or otherwise; or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.3PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.75PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.3PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="12335583A8C94E7093C8431812ABCFB5" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 41.25PT; COLOR: #000000">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 35.75PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	any other willful violation by the Executive of the provisions of this
<BR>
	Agreement; or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.75PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="80FC374064BB412D9E7EE44AB04AD32F" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 41.25PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 35.75PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(d)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	the&#160; Executive is convicted of a criminal offence involving fraud or dishonesty.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 10PT; COLOR: #000000">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 10PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 14PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.25PT; COLOR: #000000; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	9.&#160; &#160; &#160; &#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Termination by the Corporation Without Cause
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.8PT; COLOR: #000000">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.6PT; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; MARGIN-LEFT: 39.6PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 6PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	If the&#160; Corporation shall terminate the&#160; Executive's employment&#160; under this Agreement for any reason except for Cause (as defined in paragraph 8) then, upon the effective date of termination, the Corporation shall pay the Executive in one lump sum an amount equal to two (2) times the Executive's then current Base Salary, less all statutory withholdings and deductions. All the benefits theretofore provided to the Executive shall be continued as if the Executive was still an employee of the Corporation for a period of twelve
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	2) months from the date of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	termination or until equal or better benefits are provided by a&#160; new employer, whichever shall first occur
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 8PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.4PT; COLOR: #000000">

<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 8PT">

<HR STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0PX; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000; MARGIN: 4PX 0PX; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0PX; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0PX; HEIGHT: 2PX; CLEAR: BOTH; BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0PX" NOSHADE="NOSHADE">
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage187"></A>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER" ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: NORMAL; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL" ID="DSPFPAGENUMBER">
	5
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 10PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	10.&#160; &#160;&#160; Termination by Death or Disability
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.8PT; COLOR: #000000">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.6PT; TEXT-INDENT: 1.2PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; MARGIN-LEFT: 41.2PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 3.8PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	If the Executive dies or becomes disabled before the Executive's employment is otherwise terminated, the Corporation shall pay the Executive or the Executive's estate, an amount of compensation equal to six (6) months of the Executive's then current Base Salary and all the benefits theretofore provided to the Executive shall be continued, for a period of six (6) months from the date of Death or Disability as if the Executive were still an employee of the Corporation
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	If such termination is due to the Executive's Death, payment shall be made in one lump sum&#160; to the Executive's Designate. If no Executive's Designate is named or if no named Executive's Designate survives the Executive, the entire amount shall be paid to the Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	'
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	s estate within&#160; sixty (60) days of the Executive's death, If such termination is due to the Executive's Disability, payment shall be made in one lump sum to the Executive within sixty (60) days of the&#160; Executive's Disability,&#160; The compensation provided under this paragraph shall be in addition to that payable from any insurance coverage providing compensation upon Death or Disability
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	,
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 8PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.3PT; COLOR: #000000">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 8PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	11.&#160; &#160;&#160; Termination Following Change in Control
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 13PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.1PT; COLOR: #000000">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 13PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.5PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="9B41E73DCD5C449B949AC4CCE141FFFC" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 41.4PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 35.6PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	For purposes of this Agreement, a Change in Control shall be deemed to have occurred if:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.4PT; COLOR: #000000">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.6PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="B416FBDFA4CA4257B5CE06B1CE267FD8" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 77.9PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 35.1PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(i)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	any person or any person and such person's associates or affiliates, as such terms are defined in the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Securities Act
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(British Columbia) (the "Act"), makes a tender, take-over or exchange offer, circulates a proxy to shareholders or takes other steps to effect a takeover of the control of the Corporation
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	whether by way of a reverse take- over, take over bid, causing&#160; the election or appointment of a majority of directors of the Corporation or otherwise in any manner whatsoever; or
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.35PT; COLOR: #000000">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.6PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="00183E8BCB6C499791C792AAC5B71AEA" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 77.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 35.35PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(ii)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	during&#160; any period of eighteen (18) consecutive months (not including any period prior to the Effective Date), individuals who at the beginning of such period constituted the Board of Directors and any new directors, whose appointment by the Board of Directors or nomination for election by the Corporation's shareholders was approved by a vote of at least three quarters (3/4) of the Board of Directors then still in&#160; office who either were directors at the beginning of the&#160; period or whose appointment or nomination for election was previously so approved, cease for any reason to constitute a majority of the Board of Directors; or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.35PT; COLOR: #000000">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.6PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="89446BC2DC6243EA9D3CAE0A02FAD748" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 77.4PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 34.6PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(iii)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	the acquisition by any person or by any person and such person's affiliates or associates, as such terms are defined in the Act
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	and whether directly or indirectly, of common shares of the Corporation at the time held by such person and such person's affiliates and associates, totals for the first time, twenty percent (20%) or more of the outstanding common shares of the Corporation.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>

<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 41.7PT">
</TD>

	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Notwithstanding&#160; any&#160; other&#160; provisions&#160; in&#160; this&#160; Agreement&#160; regarding termination, if any of the events described above constituting a Change in Control shall have occurred during the Term or an Extended Term, upon the termination of the Executive's employment (unless such termination is because&#160; of the Executive's Death or Disability, by the Corporation for Cause or by the Executive other than for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	"
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Good Reason"
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	as defined below) the Executive shall be entitled to and will receive no later than the fifteenth (15
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	th)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	day following the date of termination a lump sum severance payment equal to three (3)&#160; times the Executive's then current Base Salary. In addition, all benefits then applicable to the Executive shall be continued for a period of eighteen (18) months after the date of termination.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>

	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	Any such notice, direction or other instrument will be deemed to have been given and received, if personally delivered, on the day it was delivered, and if by registered mail, on the third business day following the date of mailing, except in the event of disruption of the postal service in which event notice will be deemed to have been received only when actually received.
</TD>

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 10PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	13.&#160; &#160;&#160; Governing Law
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.8PT; COLOR: #000000">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.6PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0.25PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; MARGIN-LEFT: 41.25PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 4.05PT">
	This Agreement shall be governed by the laws of the Province of British Columbia and shall be binding upon the successors and assigns of the Corporation and the Executive. Should there be a disagreement or a dispute between the parties hereto with respect&#160; to this Agreement or the interpretation thereof, the matter or disagreement or dispute shall be attempted to be resolved by mediation failing which, the same shall be referred to a single arbitrator pursuant to the
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Arbitration Act
</FONT>
	of British Columbia, and the determination of such arbitrator shall be final and binding upon the parties hereto
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.3PT; COLOR: #000000">
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	14.&#160; &#160;&#160; Independent Legal Advice
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.6PT; COLOR: #000000">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.6PT; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; MARGIN-LEFT: 41.25PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.25PT">
	The Executive represents and warrants to the Corporation and acknowledges and agrees that the Executive has had the opportunity to seek and was not prevented or discouraged by the Corporation from seeking independent legal advice with respect to the contents herein and the Executive fully understands the terms and legal effect of this Agreement.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.3PT; COLOR: #000000">
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	15.&#160; &#160;&#160; Severability
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.6PT; COLOR: #000000">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.6PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0.7PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; MARGIN-LEFT: 41.25PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.15PT">
	If anyone or more of the provisions contained herein should be invalid, illegal or unenforceable in any respect in any jurisdiction, the validity, legality and enforceability of such provision shall not in any way be affected or impaired thereby in any other jurisdiction and the validity, legality and enforceability of the remaining provisions contained herein shall not in any way be affected or impaired thereby.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.3PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.3PT; COLOR: #000000; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	16.&#160; &#160;&#160; Only Agreement
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.85PT; COLOR: #000000">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.6PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; MARGIN-LEFT: 40.75PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.85PT">
	This Agreement shall constitute the only agreement between the parties governing the employment of the Executive and shall supersede any and all prior agreements that may have existed between the parties.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.55PT; COLOR: #000000">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	1
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	7.&#160; &#160; &#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Successors
</FONT>

</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.6PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; MARGIN-LEFT: 40.75PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.85PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	This Agreement is binding upon and enures to the benefit of the Corporation and its successors and the&#160; Executive and the heirs, executors, and personal legal representatives of the Executive. The Executive may not assign, pledge or encumber the Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	'
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	s interest in this Agreement or assign any of the rights or duties of the Executive hereunder without the prior written consent of the Corporation.

</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; MARGIN-LEFT: 7.7PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; MARGIN-RIGHT: 272.65PT">
	Executive Chairman of the Board
</DIV>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 5.5PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.35PT; COLOR: #000000">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 5.5PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; MARGIN-LEFT: 7.7PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; MARGIN-RIGHT: 383.8PT">
	Reports To:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 6PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.05PT; COLOR: #000000">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 6PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; MARGIN-LEFT: 7PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 64.7PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The Board of Directors ("Board") of Almaden Minerals Ltd. (the "Corporation")
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.3PT; COLOR: #000000">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; MARGIN-LEFT: 7PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; MARGIN-RIGHT: 399.1PT">
	Function:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 6PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.35PT; COLOR: #000000">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 6PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.6PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; MARGIN-LEFT: 6.5PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 3.4PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Provides, together with the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	P
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	resident and C
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	E
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	O of the Corporation, overall leadership and vision in developing, in concert with the Board, the strategic direction of the Corporation, and in developing the tactics and business plans necessary to increase shareholder value.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.6PT; COLOR: #000000">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.6PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0.25PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #363636; MARGIN-LEFT: 6.5PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 4PT">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #000000">
	Oversees the overall business to ensure strategic and&#160; business plans are effectively implemented, the results are monitored and reported to the&#160; Board, and financial and operational objectives are attained.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #000000">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 27.25PT; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; MARGIN-LEFT: 6.75PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; MARGIN-RIGHT: 280.6PT">
	Authorities and Responsibilities: General Functions:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.5PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.9PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; MARGIN-LEFT: 6.75PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 3.6PT">
	1.&#160; &#160; &#160;&#160; Act as Chairman of all meetings of the Board (except meetings of the independent members of the Board).
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.15PT; COLOR: #000000">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; MARGIN-LEFT: 6.3PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 9.25PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	2.&#160; &#160; &#160;&#160; Assist the CEO
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	the review and implementation of all contracts and submissions.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.55PT; COLOR: #000000">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.75PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; MARGIN-LEFT: 5.8PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 4.55PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	3.&#160; &#160; &#160;&#160; Assist the CEO
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	the development and implementation of concepts developed by the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	CEO.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.5PT; COLOR: #000000">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.6PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="9B7B18BBCFDB485A94C59DF64E63235E" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 5.8PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 41PX; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	4.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	Supervise the&#160; Corporation's&#160; computer system&#160; including the&#160; selection&#160;&#160; and negotiation of equipment purchase or leasing of equipment, and the maintenance and operation of the Corporation's filing and technical record keeping.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.65PT; COLOR: #000000">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.55PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0.25PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; MARGIN-LEFT: 6.05PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 4.8PT">
	5.&#160; &#160; &#160;&#160; Assist the CEO in project management including accompanying the CEO on site visits and in data review and project planning and staff supervision and instruction on site and in the&#160;&#160; selection of contractors for&#160; performance of geophysical, drilling and metallurgical services.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.9PT; COLOR: #000000">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.55PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; MARGIN-LEFT: 5.55PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5PT">
	6.&#160; &#160; &#160;&#160; Assist the CEO and Investor Relations representatives of the Corporation in the preparation and dissemination of shareholder's communications including materials for investment and professional conferences and attending with the CEO at such conferences to interface with fund managers, brokers and other investment representatives.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0.9PT; COLOR: #000000">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.5PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; MARGIN-LEFT: 5.55PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.3PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	7.&#160; &#160; &#160;&#160; Generally assist the CEO in the performance of the duties assigned to the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	CEO
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	by the Board.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.5PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; MARGIN-LEFT: 5.55PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.3PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>

<EFX_EXHIBIT_12>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_12"></A>
<DIV>
<HR STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PX SOLID; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF; HEIGHT: 10PX; COLOR: #FFFFFF; MARGIN-LEFT: AUTO; BORDER-TOP: BLACK 4PX SOLID; MARGIN-RIGHT: AUTO">
